snippet: A Max Liebermann painting was wrongfully taken by the Nazis from the collection of its Jewish owner, a team of international experts has determined.
abstract: Team of international experts determines that Two Riders on the Beach, Max Liebermann painting found in the collection of Cornelius Gurlitt, was wrongfully taken by the Nazis from its Jewish owner; ascertain that painting rightfully belongs to the descendents of the industrialist David Friedmann.
lead_paragraph: A Max Liebermann painting was wrongfully taken by the Nazis from the collection of its Jewish owner, a team of international experts has determined.

headline.main: Experts Say a Second Work in Munich Was Looted
headline.print_headline: Experts Say a Second Work in Munich Was Looted
